website_summaries.verdict: A great option for testing multiple points in a house for radon at once.
pros: 2 individual radon tests make it easy to measure different sections or levels of the home for differences in radon
Comes with quick label results turnaround
cons: Extensive instructions require a longer set up, especially for 2 tests at once

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: Read other reviews that said they sent the test in with no results. I thought maybe if I was very careful to follow the directions I might not have this issue. Sure enough, never received results. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: I don't believe they even read my test
customer_reviews.text: After submitting my test to the lab I received a letter that read something along the lines of "You have high radon, you should get another test done and then remediate it." THEY DID NOT TELL ME THE READING OF HOW MUCH RADON THERE IS. Without them giving me a reading, there is no way of knowing if this test was even read. This was a complete waste of money and I have no more information than when I started.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Riondet

customer_reviews.title: Want to know about Radon in your house.  This is a good start.
customer_reviews.text: This kit is v-e-r-y easy to use. Directions clear and simple. My one objection is that shipping expense - UPS or FedEx recommended - is not included. But, the results were received in excellent time.
customer_reviews.author: James Moore

customer_reviews.title: I did two tests because the first one returned a ...
customer_reviews.text: I did two tests because the first one returned a high reading. The first test I did over two days and got the results within 4 days. The second test I did over 4 days and got the results within two weeks. I now know I need a Radon Mitigation System in my basement.
customer_reviews.author: Trendy Dresser

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, get timely results via email.
customer_reviews.text: The no-hassle prepaid test results are nice. Just set them out for about 72 hrs. at approx. 6 ft. from floor, fill out form and mail away. Results can be received via email.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ohara

customer_reviews.title: Same result as the high priced test at 10% of cost
customer_reviews.text: I became curious about the radon level (originally low ~2 pCi) in my house several years after the initial test performed during the purchase inspection using the high-priced hand held device. This kit provided similar results, was easy to perform, results were available in the time specified (5 days), cost 10% of the high priced technology, and reassured me that all is well. What more can you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: TPM01

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this item
customer_reviews.text: Submitted my results over 2 weeks ago and still no results. Don't buy this item
customer_reviews.author: Robby

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, such kits yield unreliable tests
customer_reviews.text: The product was as described, easy to use, and it resulted in a prompt report from the lab. Unfortunately, independent research has shown such short sampling period kits to yield unreliable tests. Consider finding a kit that samples over a longer time period. It would be likely to result in a more useful test result.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced, and (presumably) accurate
customer_reviews.text: Can't attest to accuracy. We don't glow in the dark, so I guess that's good. But it's a mature technology, and it's reassuring to get a "you're boring" result. - better than a list of funeral homes or will-writing lawyers.
customer_reviews.author: AJP

customer_reviews.title: great product with prompt feedback
customer_reviews.text: the kit came on time and I sent it back according to the directions. I got my results promptly by email. The cost was very reasonable compared to a private contractor who wanted to charge 3 times the price
customer_reviews.author: trooper

customer_reviews.title: Same as the ones from Metric Health but you pay more...
customer_reviews.text: Both Metric Health and First Response uses Alpha for testing. I don't understand why this cost 50% more. I would say skip this and buy the ones from Metric Health for $22 for two.
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: LAB FEES ARE INCLUDED IN PRICE
customer_reviews.text: GET RESULTS FAST FROM LAB / ID GUESS A WEEK. BE SURE YOU PUT THE TEST IN A ROOM THST CAN REMAIN CLOSED, OR VERY LITTLE OPENING OF DOORS AND NO OPENING WINDOWS WHILE TESTING.
customer_reviews.author: maggi

customer_reviews.title: Great product. We did follow the advice about shipping ...
customer_reviews.text: We used this test with no problems. We read the instructions twice before opening, and followed them meticulously. We got our results and ended up needing to get our home mitigated. Great product. We did follow the advice about shipping and did not ship first class.
customer_reviews.author: WAS

customer_reviews.title: that our home was in the safe range for radon gas.
customer_reviews.text: the test kits were easy to use. All you had to do was follow the instructions. I received the test results in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Westcott

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, get results, if in NJ an extra $10 payment is required to get results. Free elsewhere I suspect
customer_reviews.author: FD Firefighter 121

customer_reviews.title: Used it and found I had radon problem which led ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it and found I had radon problem which led me to have a professional test done and a company come into to fix my problem.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Socie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Instructions are easy to follow. Lab results came quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just follow directions; pay for postage and it's done.
customer_reviews.text: Was very simple to do; sent it off and had results within a few days by email. Fortunately, the house passed.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome price, got the results quick, will buy again yearly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast, Easy, Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Worked well. Used each test in different locations. Sent tests in and got results back in one week!
customer_reviews.author: John E. Lendrum

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Test and return of results were seamless. We’re happy. The cats happy. Even the mice are happy.
customer_reviews.author: FW2

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Worked for what we needed it for . Peace of mind, will need to check again in winter time but test did what it was supposed to do
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Moody

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fast
customer_reviews.text: This was a simple and fast test. They even send to tests for better accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewed

customer_reviews.title: I found the product easy to use and was impressed with the time the ...
customer_reviews.text: I found the product easy to use and was impressed with the time the results came back. The key is follow the instructions to a "T" and you can't mess it up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to use. The final report received via email was thorough and timely. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I ordered them. Down stairs had more than I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kent

customer_reviews.title: The test itself was easy, but after filling out the paperwork and sending ...
customer_reviews.text: The test itself was easy, but after filling out the paperwork and sending it in to the lab to be tested(a month ago), i have still no results, haven't even heard from the company who does the testing.
customer_reviews.author: Meranda

product_meta.title: Radon Test Kit - Pack of 2
product_meta.description: While radon is a naturally occurring radioactive gas, high concentrations of radon gas in the home can be hazardous to you and your family's health. Radon can seep into your home's basement or crawl space through cracks in the foundation or walls, openings or spaces around sump pumps and drains, or construction joints or flaws. The First Alert radon test kit is listed under the EPA radon gas measurement proficiency program and can be completed in as few as two to three days. Included in the cost is the lab fee for an EPA listed lab and a return mailer. The test results are returned to you within 72 hours of lab receipt, and include the recommended next steps you will need to ensure the health of your household. --Bree Norlander What's in the Box Charcoal activated test kit, user's manual, and return mailer From the Manufacturer Charcoal model for initial screening. Test complete in 2-3 days. Includes lab fee, results and recommended next steps. Listed under the EPA radon gas measurement proficiency program.
feature_bullets: Listed under the EPA radon gas measurement proficiency program
